text: 7.5T Delivery Driver. Ready to make the magic happen? Well give you £1500 to join us! Newark. Newark Distribution Centre (LM0016). Permanent. Full Time. Join Dixons Carphone (soon to be Currys) before the 14th November 2021 as a 7.5T Driver and youll receive a new starter sign on bonus of £1500! £500 will be paid in your first salary payment and the remaining £1000 paid in May 2022 (subject to statutory deductions). Salary. OTE £32, 500 per annum (including basic salary of £26, 000, quarterly paid bonus and average overtime). Working hours. Average of 45 hours per week working 5 days on and 3 days off, which gives you an additional 33 days off work per year, with overtime available. Part-Time / flexible working opportunities are available. You will need:  A full Class C1 UK/EA licence or above with no more than 6 penalty points. CPC card and Tachograph card are desirable, CPC training is available. A passion for delivering great customer service. The ability to handle heavy stock. Your Responsibilities:. Multi-drop deliveries of heavy items including washing machines, dishwashers, fridge freezers, TVs, etc. Ensuring the right products get to the right places at the right time. Installing a range of different products for our customers (training will be given). Your benefits:. 6 weeks holiday (inclusive of bank holidays). Competitive company pension scheme. Access to continued training and development. Colleague discounts on the latest technology.

7.5T Delivery Driver

 

Ready to make the magic happen? We’ll give you £1500 to join us! 

 

Newark   
Newark Distribution Centre (LM0016) 
Permanent 
Full Time 

 

Join Dixons Carphone (soon to be Currys) before the 14th November 2021 as a 7.5T Driver and you’ll receive a new starter sign on bonus of £1500! 
£500 will be paid in your first salary payment and the remaining £1000 paid in May 2022 (subject to statutory deductions).

 

Salary 
OTE £32,500 per annum (including basic salary of £26,000, quarterly paid bonus and average overtime).

 

Working hours
Average of 45 hours per week working 5 days on and 3 days off, which gives you an additional 33 days off work per year, with overtime available.  Part-Time / flexible working opportunities are available. 

 

You will need:
 
•    A full Class C1 UK/EA licence or above with no more than 6 penalty points
•    CPC card and Tachograph card are desirable, CPC training is available
•    A passion for delivering great customer service 
•    The ability to handle heavy stock
 
 

Your Responsibilities:
 
•    Multi-drop deliveries of heavy items including washing machines, dishwashers, fridge freezers, TVs, etc 
•    Ensuring the right products get to the right places at the right time
•    Installing a range of different products for our customers (training will be given)
 

Your benefits:
•    6 weeks holiday (inclusive of bank holidays)
•    Competitive company pension scheme 
•    Access to continued training and development
•    Colleague discounts on the latest technology
